captions.text: Do not know where is this idot?
Hey where are you?
I am here from half an hour
Come fast
He and his gold

He named Sudarshan alias Suda came to
Hyderabad just for enjoying

The turn his life taken with the introduction
of a fool is the essense of our story
What man?
Where is the cooling?
It is half an hour since I got it bro
Shall I believe you?

Did I not believe when you said to
have come 30 min before?

You have learnt great in punches bro.
I will tell too.

Bloody! - Not that bro.
Remove your hand idiot

Try to understand my problem
You will have it bloody
Not that bro, she eats head in ohone
What have you loved that girl for?

They said theirs is a big family
across this total area bro.

I thought is very rich, But there are
relatives in the place of money
I see

Thought the best bro, but
came to know as cheapest
Nicely happened to the idiot

Is it not possible for me,
Should listen to elders idiot
Means?
They are cool like curd rice

Oh my!
This idiot is too week
It is Balu from the US

How are you doing bro?
I am fine and what are you doing?

Cannot explain this crap,
say what are you doing?

I am just waking up man,
Was late in the night party
You are enjoying man, go on
Leave it, how is the climate there?

Here, too comfortable to dry things
47 degrees heat, am going mad

Added is the power cut for us
How is it there?

It is 7degrees here, can sleep
warm covering the blanket

Be on that job,
want to speak to this idiot?

He is busy with his love, right?
Yes, he is on that same job

Ok bro, will call you later
Ok, bye!

Me adjacent cannot listen and
Ho would she there listen, Rascal?

Will call you later baby, ok?
What man?

Balu is enjoying man. I should
have born there to make them go mad.

You do not need to be born there for it,
enough if you just go there bro
Is it so easy? - It is too easy bro

Book it then, will go next week
and stay with him for two months

Do you think it as Nellore to Hyderabad
to come in Volvo bus and stay at Ameerpet in a room?
America, it is America man
You said simple

It is simple, but will be easy if you
approach through a consultancy
Ok, let us go then

Hello baby, 2 Idli, 2 Dosa and Pongal for grandma
Right, I will bring it while coming
Bloody Phani, what are those works?
No man, grandma has no teeth and thus pongal
Discount added to your fate, ok move

No bro, spare me for an hour.
Will give the food and be back
Let us leave now
Does not understand without this
Welcome sir! -It is

Welcome to Bhamchik consultancy,
how can I help you?
Hey, you speak on. - Me

I want
Same again, forgot Telugu totally

Telugu sir?
Yes, Telugu
What do you want sir?
Need US education details

Go to the 4th cabin and you get them there.
Ok sir
Hey, come on

To America right, bring 4 photos
and two copies. We can send him off

Not a big problem. Please be seated.
Thank you sir

I said you right, we can send him off.
Just send 4 photos and two sets applications

I will take care of the rest
You send, I will take are of it

Why did he bring only one?
I am the only one going, right?

We will discuss about payment.
There is no much logic in it. Ok?
Sir, sir. - Shh

Why is he drinking my coffee without decency?
It was you drinking first, be positive
He and his bloody nature!

Sorry sir, important call!
Tell me your names

Sudarshan sir. - Phani sir
Venkatappayya
Venkatappayya?

Anyways, who wants to go?
Me sir

To where?
America

Why only to America in particular?
My friend is out there.

What?
That is, colleges are good there sir.
Yes, yes!  - Oh!

What did you study? - BA
Degree sir

Hey, we have the degree certificate.
That is what is BA man.
Ye, BA sir

What is BA?
Bachelor..

Sir, sir please
Let him tell

It is BA sir
What is that BA?

It is BA sir
What is BA?
Bachelor, leave it. I do not know sir.

What do you know exactly?
It is a crime not to know what you read.

Sir, sir do something and send me sir
You will send me, right sir?

Let us see.
Hey, that girl is calling me man.
Embarrassed, I too will shoot you bloody
Have you at least written your exams?
I wrote for three years sir. - I see

Which subject? Subject names..
Sir, that is human
One minute, you please tell

Telugu, English, Hindi, Science,
even social was there right?
Oh, I understood. Means last is 10th.

Sir! - Hand again?
Why hiding at you sir?

You will not debar and I am not in exams.
I did not write exams, but certificates are original.
College was of my uncle sir.

Do you not have shame? Someone wrote exams
and you pass in that?

Do you have the shame sir?
You drank my coffee

What, this one?
Sorry sir, I got emotional

You could have said man,
I tried to sir, but you said shhh

Leave it, what can we do now
You do not stop for this reason, right sir?
What is the link to that, leave it
Ok, something or the other

Now, there is an exam. That would be for nine
Bangaram!

If you come near 6 or 5, will manage to send
Is it?

What shall I do coming at 6 when exam is at 9 sir?
I will not read before 2 hours, memory gets corrupted

Hey man, 9 means for 9 points and 9'o clock
Sir, tell him sir, tell him

She is in hospital it seems. - Who?
It seems her grandma is in hospital

How many days more would she eat pongal?
Let her die man, - Hey bro

Come on bro, switch off your cell phone
Listen to me for now, I will take care.
Hello excuse me sir. - yes sir
How much would be the fees sir?

Sir, as you say America, it would be
about 10 to 15 lachs sir

What sir, are you constructing any house?
Hey, please man. -Ok, I am fine with it sir
They would give a form in the recepetion.

Fill it and write the exam.
Be seen if you cross 5.
For now leave me. Please sir
Ok sir. - Sir, please

Ok sir, bye sir, good night
-Good night

Thank you sir
Oh thanks sir

Bro, got the message BREAKUP
Call her first
Switched off bro
Call again
Unavaialable now bro

Now it is broken man
What are you saying?

What for you, if not her some other
If you are missed they would miss break fast

Put message Bangaram, rest in peace
and then change off your SIM

Oh God! Please be seated sir
Got 6 here

How did they come?
They came in net yesterday night

I am unable to believe this.
It costed 80000 for that belief

Ok Los Angels and California are
okayed for the marks you got

Your wish, anything is ok. But not JNTU,
paper correction is very strict there

It is very bad
Ok ok we shall do it

Do one thing now, go to Embasy Office
and get visa, I will send you some how

Anyways, I feel proud
Leave it sir, what have you done?
Hey practice English, would be easy at Embassy
Ok bro! No, no Ok dude!
Sir, can you please tell this address

I tell, go straight take right, road tight
building white, empty sight

backside black gate, that is it
Excellent sir!

Bro, it is just a week you came in
How did you tell that?

You said to practice English and
What about him then?
Think about your babe first

All the best bro
Shut up idiot!

Please come in
Please be seated

What is your name?
P Sudarshan Reddy sir

Why are you going to America?
I am going, reading, enjoying, coming marriage sir

Come again, sorry
Come again

He looks to be in some other work
What happened?

Thank you sir
Where are you going, come here

What happened?
Thank you sir

Why are you going to America?
I am going, reading, enjoying, coming marriage

I did not get you.
Come again, sorry

Thank you
Why is he making me just roam
Come again means tell again sir

Hey co-operate for two minutes
Ok sir

I am going, reading, enjoying, coming marriage
Come again gentleman, I did not get you
Hey why are you here without knowing English?

Why are you shouting on me?
I will cancel your VISA

What is he saying man?
That is a big line, need a bigger note

Take these two small ones
It is ok sir

He says to cancel the VISA sir
Will a bribe work at him?

By bribing will cease the passport
and you cannot cross even India

I should not stay anymore now and leaving
Request him and our work will be done

Sir please sir, I am go America sir
My small life dream sir

Meet my friend Balu, enjoy there
on the way, buy 5 Whiskey bottles for you sir
I am begging sir, this idiot cannot understand

I am beggar sir, please send me America sir
Please sir, please sir

Ok gentleman, I understand your feelings
Go there and have fun. All the best!

Hey leave it, like a small kid and you
UK if not US and Singapore if not that
Pakistan even if not that
He stamped bro
You are a lucky fellow man

Lucky guy achieves only once
Talented always achieves
Means you go only for now?
Means he has the talent
He understands only saying so
After 5 months
Our Sudha reached America so
What more are you wishing bro?
Planning to leave for USA
Why late, let us go to the consultancy then?
Ok, let us go

We want to give a message taking
this short film opportunity
Please save girl child, we support MARD

It is big mistake to blame Governments
after doing mistake ourselves

Change should come within
and start from within

title: America ki Daredi | Telugu Comedy Short Film | By Srikanth with English Subtitles

comments.author: gold fish

comments.text:
A very important effort. Great natural performances. It actually looked 
like they were living it up and Direction of Photography was great. I got 
my Visa approved and leave for Cali this 14th Dec 2014. This film is a real 
depiction of how telugu students strive to get to America and once approved 
act like twas a piece of cake :) I am a telugu guy with an English 
Background. Proud to be A telugite. All the very best for future 
Endeavours. Khelpedia. Keep entertaining us. and use sub titles for the 
rest so the World can enjoy your work :) Cheers. ﻿
